label: 小朝拝
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: First Day of the New Year.  In contrast to the chōga, whihc was a great public event, the kojōhai was a private ceremony in the easter courtyard of Seiryōden, in which only holders of the first six ranks participated (p. 381). [朝賀、清涼殿]
